    <h1>Fraud, Waste, or Abuse Hotline</h1>

    
        
            <p></p>
        
            <p>You can use this form to report fraud, waste, or abuse that is related to funds from the following:</p>
            
            <ul>
                <li>The General Appropriations Act-expenditures by state agencies, colleges, and universities or use of state grant money.</li>
                <li>The federal stimulus or American Recovery and Reinvestment Act.</li>
                <li>Hurricane Ike.</li>
            </ul>
            
            <p>This report will be submitted to the SAO for review.  Persons who report fraud may choose to remain anonymous.  Any information submitted may be subject to the Public Information Act.</p>

            <div class="HotlineEmail" >
                <label for="ContentPlaceHolder1_txtEmail" id="ContentPlaceHolder1_lblEmail">Do not type anything here.</label>
                <input name="ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$txtEmail" type="text" id="ContentPlaceHolder1_txtEmail" />
            </div>

            </p>
